items.title: Bixby to get a major AI upgrade with One UI 8.5
items.summary: When the AI revolution began, many were expecting Samsung to upgrade its assistant Bixby with an AI brain, but that didn't come with the last couple of One UI upgrades. Now, a Reddit user shared some screenshots from their rooted device, running One UI 8.5 and showing off a brand new, smarter Bixbyâ€¦

items.summary: At this year's CES, AMD felt like a dominant force, too focused on AI potential to talk about (or to) consumers. Intel looked more like a laser-focused startup, confidently pitching its Panther Lake chips to gamers, laptop users, and even robot makers.

items.title: New players, new managers - what to look out for in WSL after winter break

items.title: Spurs captain Romero given additional ban after red card
items.summary: Tottenham captain Cristian Romero is given an additional one-match suspension and fined Â£50,000 for his behaviour during his side's Premier League defeat to Liverpool last month.

items.summary: The Samsung Galaxy S26+ has received its TUV certification, which reveals that it comes with a battery having a rated capacity of 4,755 mAh. This will most likely be marketed by Samsung as a 4,900 mAh rated capacity, unchanged from the Galaxy S25+. The S26+ supports 45W wired charging. The Galaxy Aâ€¦

items.summary: The 6GW will come from various suppliers â€” both existing and upcoming â€” to deliver the estimated 1GW that Meta's Prometheus site will require in 2026, and the 5GW its Hyperion data center will need by 2028.

items.title: Rangers & Motherwell have tickets cut for pyro use
items.summary: Rangers and Motherwell have their away allocations cut by 50 tickets for one match for repeated breaches of SPFL rules regarding pyrotechnics, while Aberdeen and Hibs are issued with suspended penalties.

items.title: Chelsea charged after bottle thrown following Villa loss
items.summary: The Football Association (FA) charges Chelsea after a bottle is thrown towards Aston Villa's bench in December.

One of those products that we nevertheless think holds promise is Ankerâ€™s AeroFit Pro 2, which are wireless earbuds that can double as open-ear headphones. You pick the moâ€¦

items.summary: What is Liam Rosenior's style of play and how might his Chelsea side shape up tactically?

items.title: Honor Magic8 Pro Air launch date revealed
items.summary: Honor has officially announced the launch date of its upcoming Magic8 series smartphone. After recent teasers, the company has now confirmed that the model will debut as the Magic8 Pro Air. The handset will be unveiled in China on January 19. Recent teasers and leaks have revealed that the Magic8 Pâ€¦

items.title: Macclesfield's 'massive occasion' tinged with sadness
items.summary: Non-league Macclesfield host holders Crystal Palace in the FA Cup on Saturday, 25 days after the death of their player Ethan McLeod.

items.title: Brosnan, Prince Naseem and the embrace that never happened
items.summary: When Prince Naseem Hamed met actor Pierce Brosnan in the lead-up to a new film, it brought back thoughts of a reconciliation with trainer Brendan Ingle that never happened.

items.title: vivo X200T specs leak again
items.summary: vivo is working on the X200T for the Indian market, and purported specs for it were already leaked back in December. Now a tipster on X is back with another round. According to him, the device has a 6.67-inch AMOLED screen with 1260x2800 resolution, and a 50MP main camera using Sony's Lytia 702 senâ€¦

items.title: Lava teases new smartphone with a screen on the back, Xiaomi-style
items.summary: Lava took a look at the Xiaomi 17 Pro and Xiaomi 17 Pro Max and decided it wants in on that rear screen action. Hence, the brand is now teasing an upcoming smartphone that also has a display on the back, integrated into a big camera island. This being Lava, we expect the phone to be a mid-ranger, wâ€¦

items.title: Oppo Find N7 to compete head-on with the iPhone Fold with a wider form factor
items.summary: Oppo is expected to unveil the Find N6 in February, but according to a new rumor from "a trusted industry insider" this won't be its only foldable device launching this year. Instead, it will be joined in September by the Find N7, which will also be a book-style foldable, but with a twist. This oneâ€¦

items.title: Samsung Galaxy M17e is coming, likely a rebrand of a surprising device
items.summary: The Google Play Console's Supported Devices list has a surprise for us today - the Samsung Galaxy M17e 5G. This is obviously coming soon, since it's been added to this list, and like all of the M-series devices, it's a rebranded A-series model. But which exact one may surprise you. It is in fact a â€¦

items.title: The Moto G Power (2026) is now available in the US
items.summary: Motorola unveiled the Moto G Power (2026) back in mid-December, and today the phone has become available in the US, as previously promised. You can purchase one from Amazon, Best Buy, Verizon, and Motorola's online store in Pantone Pure Cashmere and Pantone Evening Blue for a recommended retail priâ€¦

items.title: Slot pleased with 'disciplined' Liverpool performance
items.summary: Liverpool boss Arne Slot is full of praise for how "disciplined" his side were as they held Premier League leaders Arsenal to a 0-0 draw at Emirates Stadium.

items.title: Arsenal too 'unprecise' with final ball - Arteta
items.summary: Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta feels his side were too "unprecise" with their final ball as they were held to a 0-0 draw by Liverpool at Emirates Stadium.

items.title: Arsenal extend lead at top of table after draw with Liverpool
items.summary: Arsenal miss the chance to move eight points clear at the top of the Premier League after they are held to a frustrating goalless draw by Liverpool.

items.title: Xiaomi to test the durability of its latest Redmi phones live on air
items.summary: The Redmi Note 15 series was recently launched for global markets, and the Xiaomi sub-brand bills these devices as "Titan tough", with enhanced durability. Interestingly, Redmi now wants to prove just how tough they are, and will do so live on air on January 10 at 4 PM in China, which is 1:30 PM inâ€¦

items.title: Audeze launches Maxwell 2 headset, with better spatial immersion and bass â€” plus, of course, improved AI noise-canceling mic tech
items.summary: Audeze launched its new Maxwell 2 planar magnetic gaming headset at CES 2026, with improved audio and mic technology, and swappable side plates.

items.summary: In 2013, the late Terry Yorath spoke to BBC Wales Sport before the League Cup final between Swansea City and Bradford City, teams he had managed.

items.title: Nvidia to demand full upfront payment for H200 GPUs from China customers, report claims â€”  more than two million chips may have been ordered despite uncertain Beijing stance
items.summary: Nvidia has reportedly imposed non-refundable, full upfront payment terms on H200 GPU sales to China-based clients to hedge regulatory risks as Chinese customers had ordered more than 2 million H200 units that the company yet has to make.

items.title: 'The culture needs to change' - Vaughan on Brook nightclub altercation

items.title: 'He's a yard short!' - Labuschagne run out as England show late fight
